title: Jenkins and Jonez - Klay Is Back, Maybe the Lakers Are Too?
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - Klay Is Back, Maybe the Lakers Are Too?
description:
The guys discuss Klay Thompson finally making it back to an NBA game, the Lakers finding their footing with LeBron James playing center, Ime Udoka being a first-ballot finger-pointing hall of famer, and bring back Booger Boy of the Week for an all-timer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
